data.title: Massage yes
data.text: My wife gets her massages her on the special deal. 5 massages only $125. Can't beat it for the 1 hour massage. Try it you will love it.

data.title: Best Ever
data.text: Need to find high-quality and professional massage care near McAllen, TX? Look no further. My recent visit truly exceeded my expectations. Because of school, I am constantly carrying around a lot of weight, including my books and laptop. I had never received a massage before but decided it was time when I was waking up with a sore left shoulder. I selected Massage Masters because of their excellent reputation and I was thrilled with my experience there. My friendly Massage Therapist greeted me and directed me to the room where I was assured that I would receive the massage treatment specific to my needs. She recommended the type of massage that would be best for both my shoulder and my other personal preferences and assured me that she knew the best therapuetic techniques for me. I left the massage room feeling like a new person - refreshed, rejuvenated, and free of the aching pain and soreness in my shoulder. I can't thank you enough.

data.title: Massage Masters Review
data.text: I was not at all impressed with the way they answer the phone. I called a couple times. Once they were busy and didn't even bother to offer other available dates/times. Another time the person was very sarcastic with his responses. On both occasions it was a male who answered the phone. They need to improve their communication skills and work ethics.

owner_response.author: MassageMasters, Manager at Massage Masters, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I am sorry to hear about your experience over the phone. Please give us a call at your convenience for a resolution.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
